articles.title: Bharat NCAP and Global NCAP: what’s similar and what’s different - Autocar Professional
articles.description: Global NCAP will hand over the reins of Indian vehicle crash testing to Bharat NCAP, bringing an end to the 'Safer cars for India' programme.
